classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building applications with large language models, specifically mentioning RAG, GPT-4, and generative AI. It also details core responsibilities like developing user-facing widgets, integrating AI features into existing products, and abstracting AI providers, aligning perfectly with the 'GenAI Engineer' definition.
